proposed_strategy.name: Single Prapathaka Chunk
proposed_strategy.description: The entire first Prapathaka is consolidated into a single chunk as its total character count is well below the safety limit. Chunking boundaries strictly follow Prapathaka start/end.

execution_plan.description: Chāndogyopaniṣat, Prapathaka 1, covering all 13 Khandas and prefatory material.

parsing_instructions.justification: The Prapathaka is structurally divided into Khandas, which serve as the primary semantic and manageable processing units.

start_pattern.description: A new Khanda starts with a bolded heading indicating its number, often followed by the topic in brackets.

end_pattern.description: The end of a Khanda is marked by a concluding line for the commentary, sometimes followed by the closing marker for the Khanda itself (e.g., **।। इति सप्तमः खण्डः ।।**). The commentary closure is the most reliable delimiter.

parsing_instructions.pre_content_handling: Handle the initial 'शान्तिपाठः' and the 'प्रकाशिका' introduction/Mangalacarana as a single 'Prefatory' section before parsing the first numbered Khanda.
